name: Dig and Shoot
description: It looks like a simple play, but there's a deeper story behind it.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: Single-Core 1.5GHz Processor Memory: 256 MB RAM Storage: 15 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 768 MB RAM Storage: 15 MB available space
